resources.string: The first request always fails. Press \"Retry\" to try again or \"Cancel\" to dismiss this message.
I am custom toast launched by the \"SingleLiveEvent\". To see the consequences press \"Show another fragment\".
I am custom toast launched by the \"DatabindingSingleLiveEvent\". To see the consequences press \"Show another fragment\".

Press "Back".

If you launched this fragment after showing toast via SingleLiveEvent you'll see toast again.

If you launched this fragment after showing toast via DatabindingSingleLiveEvent you will not see it again.
